content: You will fight Misty Cloud and Cloudy Mist in a boss fight as part of the story and will come across the pair naturally as you progress through Furnace Valley. To reach them from the Valley Entrance Keeper's Shrine, simply keep heading forward, and you will find yourself in their arena when you pass through a pair of stone pillars.
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "Misty_Cloud,_Cloudy_Mist_Spirit.md", within the section "Misty Cloud, Cloudy Mist Spirit" and the sub-section "Misty Cloud, Cloudy Mist Location". The content is presented below:

You will fight Misty Cloud and Cloudy Mist in a boss fight as part of the story and will come across the pair naturally as you progress through Furnace Valley. To reach them from the Valley Entrance Keeper's Shrine, simply keep heading forward, and you will find yourself in their arena when you pass through a pair of stone pillars.
